name: joy

name: joy

name: joy
dialog: !Joy pushes Sadness away before she can touch it.

name: riley

name: mom
dialog: Hi honey.

name: riley
dialog: Where’s Dad?

name: mom
dialog: On the phone. This new venture iskeeping him pretty busy. Your dad’s a little stressed -- you know, about getting his new company up and running...

name: mom
dialog: I guess all I really want to sayis: thank you.

name: anger
dialog: Anger drops the controls.

name: mom
dialog: You know, through all thisconfusion you’ve stayed... well, you’ve stayed our happy girl!Mom brushes Riley’s cheek.

name: joy
dialog: Whoa! Well.Huh?.

name: riley
dialog: (smiles)Yeah! Sure.

name: mom

name: anger
dialog: Well, you can’t argue with Mom.32.“Happy” it is.

name: disgust

name: joy
dialog: Looks like we’re going into REM. Igot Dream Duty, so I’ll take care of sending these to Long Term. Great day today, guys! Sleep well TEAM HAPPY!The team heads off to bed. Harp music plays.

name: dad
dialog: Well, this is it. The new place.-- except it’s haunted! Organ music. Ghosts howling. The dead mouse rises up into frame.MOUSECome live with me, Riley!The mouse falls over, dead. A bear enters, holding a pizza.PIZZA BEARSomebody order a broccoli pizza?The pizza slices hop up and dance a jig.PIZZA SLICE Eat me! I’m organic!

name: joy

name: joy

name: joy
dialog: Hello! Did I wake you?

dialog: (covering phone)Have a good day at school, Monkey! All three make monkey sounds at each other.

name: riley
dialog: Uhh... okay. My name is RileyAndersen. I’m from Minnesota. And now I live here.TEACHERAnd how about Minnesota?... Can youtell us something about it? Well you certainly get a lot more snow than we do.

name: joy
dialog: (laughs)She’s hilarious! She turns a lever.39.

name: riley
dialog: Yeah, it gets pretty cold. The lakefreezes over, and that’s when we play hockey. I’m on a great team. We’re called the Prairie Dogs. My friend Meg plays forward. My Dad’s the coach. Pretty much everyone in my family skates.

name: riley
dialog: It’s a kind of family tradition. Wego out on the lake almost every weekend.

name: riley
dialog: Or we did, ‘til I moved away.

name: anger
dialog: Huh?/Hey, what gives?/What?

name: joy

name: sadness

name: riley
dialog: (sniffling)We used to play tag and stuff...

name: disgust

name: joy

name: sadness
dialog: IS DRIVING.

Joy lunges, knocking the blue core memory out of Sadness’s hands. It’s SUCKED UP the vacuum tube.Joy trips backward. In the chaos a yellow core memory rolls toward the tube.

Looks like there’s something inthere. I’m going to turn it on for a minute and burn out the gunk.She closes the door.

dialog: Sadness!Joy rounds a corner and spots Sadness far down the next row.

name: sadness
dialog: Joy?Inexplicably, Sadness turns and runs away.

name: joy
dialog: Come back!Joy uses a super-long fry to vault over the mound of fries.Sadness!.

name: joy
dialog: What? Sadness!

name: sadness
dialog: (crying)I only make everything worse!

name: anger
dialog: It’s stuck!

name: disgust
dialog: Oh great.

name: disgust
dialog: I got it! Make her feel scared!That’ll make her change her mind!

name: anger
dialog: Let me try!Disgust and Fear pound on the console buttons.

name: joy
dialog: Hey! Hey, look at me. Did you meanwhat you said before?

name: anger
dialog: .IMAGINARY BOYFRIENDI would die for Riley! I would diefor Riley!

name: joy
dialog: (to herself)This is crazy, this is crazy... No, no, no! Joy! Be positive.(beat)I am POSITIVE this is crazy!.Joy spots the trampoline on Family Island, then Sadness floating away. She times it...

name: disgust
dialog: It’s Joy!

name: anger
dialog: Stand back! Arrrrgh!Anger throws a chair at the window. It bounces off.

name: disgust
dialog: Joy, you’ve got to fix this. Get upthere.

name: joy
dialog: Sadness, it’s up to you.

name: sadness
dialog: Joy pushes Sadness towards the console.Me?.Sadness?!?

name: sadness
dialog: She grips the Idea Bulb. The console is now completely black.

name: riley
dialog: Wait! Stop! I wanna get off.The bus stops. Riley runs to the front and out the door.

name: mom
dialog: Alright. Thank you. We will. (to Dad)Her teacher hasn’t even seen Riley all day.

name: dad
dialog: What? I can't believe this.

name: riley
dialog: I know you don’t want me to but...I miss home. I miss Minnesota. Mom and Dad, concerned, listen quietly.

name: mom
dialog: Oh sweetie...

name: dad
dialog: We’re not mad. You know what? Imiss Minnesota too. I miss the woods where we took hikes.

name: anger
dialog: Friendship Island has expanded.Glad they finally opened that Friendly Arguments section.

name: sadness
dialog: I like Tragic Vampire RomanceIsland.

name: disgust
dialog: Fashion Island. Everyone shut up!

name: joy
dialog: Say what you want, I think it’s allbeautiful.WORKER FRITZAlright!The Emotions turn to see workers at a new, larger console.WORKER FRITZ (CONT’D) There you go. Your new expandedconsole is up and running. The new console lights up.

name: dad
dialog: Now when you get out there, you beaggressive!

name: riley
dialog: (embarrassed)I know, Dad.

name: mom
dialog: -- but not too aggressive.

name: joy
dialog: Awww...
They love us!

name: anger
dialog: Yeah, Mom and Dad are pretty cool.

name: disgust
dialog: Guys, of course they are. But wecan’t SHOW IT!

name: dad-fear
dialog: She loved the face painting!

name: dad-anger
dialog: Ha! Told you it was a great idea!Dad turns to Mom. She smiles, and we zoom in to her head...

name: mum-anger
dialog: Best idea he’s had in awhile.

name: mum-sadness
dialog: He’s a really good guy.They all sigh. Mom’s Anger tosses the MEMORY of the Brazilian helicopter pilot. Mom’s Fear retrieves it.

name: mum-fear
dialog: Just in case..

name: riley
dialog: Oh. Sorry!She smiles.ZOOM IN TO THE BOY’S HEAD.

name: riley
dialog: Uhh... Ooooo-kay. Bye!Riley skates out onto the ice, looking back over her shoulder... with a hint of a smile?HOCKEY TEAMMATE All set, Riley?She HIGH-FIVES a new teammate. They skate into position as Mom and Dad cheer from the stands.

name: joy
dialog: You ready?Yeah!

name: joy
dialog: All right Anger, take it!

name: anger
dialog: Give us that puck or you’re deadmeat! Riley gets it!

name: disgust
dialog: Let’s just try not to get allsmelly this time.

name: sadness
dialog: Hooh, Mom and Dad are watching usfail.
